discovery.instruction: In Cursor, open the worker file: {worker_file}

documentation.getting_started: Cursor works identically to Claude Code for Czarina. Open the worker file in your Cursor workspace and the AI will read and follow the instructions. Cursor is a VS Code fork with AI capabilities built-in.
tips: Use Cmd/Ctrl+P to quickly open worker files
Cursor's git integration works seamlessly with Czarina branches
You can have multiple workers open in split view for parallel work
Cursor supports both Claude and GPT-4 - choose based on task complexity
Use Cmd/Ctrl+K for inline AI editing
The @-symbol references work similarly to Claude Code
limitations: Requires installation and API key configuration
Some features require Cursor Pro subscription
